fields.name: Accessibility of commercial spaces
fields.description: % of commercial spaces accessible (e.g. provision for disabled access)

fields.name: Accessibility of open spaces
fields.description: % of open spaces accessible (e.g. provision for motability aids)

fields.name: Accessibility to CH buildings
fields.description: % of CH buildings accessible (e.g. provision for visual impairment)

fields.name: Access to CH sites
fields.description: Number of tickets sold in a given time frame

fields.name: Access to dedicated websites
fields.description: Number of accesses to websites in a given time frame

fields.name: Access to physical information points
fields.description: Number of accesses to physical information points in a given time frame.

fields.name: Apps and digital instruments
fields.description: Number downloads of apps and digital CH services

fields.name: Availability of physical information points
fields.description: Number of physical information points

fields.name: CH sites belonging to networks or communities of practice
fields.description: Number of CH sites belonging to networks or communities of practice

fields.name: Opening hours
fields.description: Average number of opening hours for CH buildings (per week).

fields.name: Availability of booking services
fields.description: % of CH sites for which a booking service is available

fields.name: Free access days to CH sites
fields.description: Number of free access days to CH sites for which the purchase of a ticket is usually required

fields.name: Free access to CH sites
fields.description: Number of free access CH sites

fields.name: Dirtiness and urban blight
fields.description: Surveyed perception (Range : 1 Good-5 bad range) of dirtiness/blight of the main open spaces

fields.name: Open space lighting
fields.description: Surveyed perception (1 Good - 5 Bad ) of the adequacy of open space lighting. Also can use % of adequately lit spaces.

fields.name: Perceived safety
fields.description: Surveyed perception (1 Good - 5 Bad range) of the safety of the main external spaces

fields.name: CCTV and surveillance
fields.description: Number of CCTV cameras on the area

fields.name: Crime
fields.description: Example 1 - Number of crime complaints in a given time frame. Example 2 - Number of people prosecuted.

fields.name: Reporting from citizens
fields.description: Number of reports from citizens of inappropriate behaviours (e.g. vandalism) in a given timeframe

fields.name: Road safety
fields.description: Number of road accidents in a given time frame

fields.name: Availability of information for disabled individuals
fields.description: Example 1 - % of CH buildings with information for disabled individuals. Example 2 - Number of signposts provided.

fields.name: Availability of multilanguage information
fields.description: % of CH buildings with multilanguage information

fields.name: Availability of tourist information
fields.description: % of CH sites with tourist information signs

fields.name: Access to public transportation buses for disabled individuals
fields.description: % of buses with disabled access circulating in the area

fields.name: Bikesharing hubs
fields.description: number of bike sharing hubs (not bicycles, but hubs!)

fields.name: Carsharing hubs
fields.description: number of car sharing hubs (not cars, but hubs!)

fields.name: Electrical vehicles charging points
fields.description: number of EV charging points

fields.name: E-mobility hubs
fields.description: Number of e-mobility sharing points

fields.name: Park and ride hubs
fields.description: Number of park and ride hubs

fields.name: Parking for disabled individuals
fields.description: Number of disabled parking spaces

fields.name: Parkings
fields.description: Number of car parkings

fields.name: Public transportation provisions
fields.description: You can use this category for: 1) Total number of public transportation lines (buses, trams, undergrounds, etc.) 2) Total number of public transportation stops

fields.name: Taxi waiting areas
fields.description: number of taxi waiting areas

fields.name: Administrative management tools for accessibility
fields.description: number of administrative management tools for accessibility

fields.name: Satisfaction (accessibility)
fields.description: Surveyed perception (1 Good -5 Bad range) of the accessibility of the area

fields.name: Offline initiative for the involvement of population
fields.description: Number of initiatives in a given time frame

fields.name: Online initiatives for the involvement of population
fields.description: Number of initiatives in a given time frame

fields.name: People in the area
fields.description: Number of initiatives for the in a given time frame

fields.name: People involved offline
fields.description: Number of initiatives  in a given time frame

fields.name: People involved online
fields.description: Ratio of people in the area in a given time frame and a corresponding previous period

fields.name: Agreements for the nonconventional use of public space
fields.description: Number of agreements for nonconventional use of public spaces

fields.name: Collaboration agreements for cultural initiatives
fields.description: Number of collaboration agreements for CH initiatives

fields.name: Common services for cultural producers
fields.description: Number of common service for cultural producers

fields.name: Cooperation agreements between private companies and startups/spinoffs
fields.description: Number of cooperation agreements between private companies and startups/spinoffs

fields.name: New spaces for collaboration activities
fields.description: Number of new spaces for collaboration activities

fields.name: Private Public Partnerships in CH
fields.description: Number of PPPs for CH in the area in a given time frame

fields.name: CH cultural events in open spaces
fields.description: Number of cultural events in open spaces. Number of people attending cultural events in open spaces

fields.name: Co-designed and co-realized products and services for cultural initiatives
fields.description: Number of co-designed and co-realized products and services for cultural initiatives

fields.name: Creative clusters
fields.description: Number of creative clusters in the area

fields.name: Opening of galleries and artistic workshops
fields.description: Number of new openings of art galleries or art workshops

fields.name: Satisfaction (collaboration)
fields.description: Surveyed perception (1 Good-5 Bad range) of the possibilities for collaboration for CH in the area

fields.name: Bicycle racks
fields.description: Number of bicycles that could be parked in racks

fields.name: Bike sharing users
fields.description: Number of shared bicycles available

fields.name: Cycling paths
fields.description: Length of cycling pahts

fields.name: E-mobility use
fields.description: Number of journeys made. Average distance per trip

fields.name: Pedestrian areas
fields.description: Length of pedestrian areas

fields.name: Shared bicycles
fields.description: Number of bike sharing users

fields.name: Use of bike sharing services
fields.description: Number of bike sharing uses in a given time frame

fields.name: Campaigns for the sustainable use of public spaces
fields.description: Number of campaigns for the sustainable use of public spaces

fields.name: Events in public spaces
fields.description: Number of events in public spaces in a given timeframe

fields.name: Informal gathering points
fields.description: Number of informal gathering points

fields.name: Initiatives against urban blight
fields.description: Number of people involved in initiatives against urban blight

fields.name: People flows
fields.description: Number of people in public spaces over period of time

fields.name: Renovation of open spaces
fields.description: number of open sapces being renovated

fields.name: Citizen's associations
fields.description: Number of associations operating in the area

fields.name: Educational initiatives
fields.description: Number of people involved in educational initiatives within time frame

fields.name: Funding projects proposed by ROCK stakeholders
fields.description: Value of funding projects proposed by the ROCK stakeholders

fields.name: Projects proposed by local communities
fields.description: Number of projects proposed by local communities in a given timeframe

fields.name: Size of ROCK's stakeholder ecosystem
fields.description: Number of people or associations involved in ROCK's stakeholder ecosystem

fields.name: Expenditure for the renovation of CH spaces
fields.description: Costs of renovation of CH spaces

fields.name: Public expenditure for the ordinary management of CH
fields.description: Public expenditure for the ordinary management of CH

fields.name: Real estate values – commercial
fields.description: Ratio of commercial RE value in the area vs. the average value in the city

fields.name: Real estate values – residential
fields.description: Ratio of residential RE value in the area vs. the average value in the city

fields.name: Reduction in the public expenditure of CH
fields.description: Ratio between current public expenditure for CH management in a given time frame and in an corresponding previous period

fields.name: Commercial use of public spaces (dehors)
fields.description: Surface of public space for commercial use (sqm)

fields.name: Impact of restaurants and bars
fields.description: % of public restaurants services compared to total number of restaurants

fields.name: Opening and closing of commercial activities
fields.description: Ratio between new openings and end of commercial activities

fields.name: Agreements for waste reduction
fields.description: Number of agents involved in waste reduction agreements

fields.name: Production of waste from commercial activities
fields.description: Ratio between waste produced by commercial activities in a given time frame and a in an corresponding previous period

fields.name: Waste collection islands
fields.description: Number of waste collection islands

fields.name: Air pollution
fields.description: Number of days in which pollutant (NO2,PM2.5,PM10) concentration is higher than the threshold level

fields.name: Climatic discomfort
fields.description: Data based on Discomfort index (Thom Index) o THI (Temperature - Humiidty Index) – To be defined

fields.name: Detection of acoustic pollution
fields.description: Measured decibels over noise threshold.

fields.name: Green areas
fields.description: Surface area covered by greening projects (sqm)

fields.name: Reporting of acoustic pollution
fields.description: Number of complaints per time period (frequency and time of day)

fields.name: Shadowing effect (trees, etc)
fields.description: Number of shadowing projects in the area

fields.name: Administrative instruments to manage sustainability
fields.description: Number of programmes, regulaton or other specific administrative instruments for sustainability or for the prevention of environmental risks which apply in the area

fields.name: Thresholds and limits in local regulation
fields.description: Values of threshold limits for air and acoustic pollution

fields.name: Satisfaction (sustainability)
fields.description: Surveyed perception (1 Good -5 Bad range) of the satisfaction of the area's sustainability
